shape_type.description: Determines how the ray-cast will handle blocks.

type.description:
[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/can_see)

Checks whether the straight path from the actor entity's eyes to the target entity's eyes is unobstructed.

Type ID: `origins:can_see`
